Description: Size of living area in square feet.
Size of the lot in square feet.
‘1’ if the property has a waterfront, ‘0’ if not.
An index from 0 to 4 of how good the view of the property was.
Condition of the house, ranked from 1 to 5.

Classification by construction quality which refers to the types of materials used and the quality of workmanship. Buildings of better quality (higher grade) cost more to build per unit of measure and command higher value.

Average size of land lots for the closest 15 houses, in square feet.
